mapper.select: select m.id,m.oid,j.qid,m.jid,m.x,m.y,m.styleIndex,m.detail,o.oldName from marker_house m,marker_street j,oldman o WHERE m.jid=j.id AND m.oid=o.oid

SELECT l.id,l.x_g,l.y_g,l.x_y,l.y_y,l.x_r,l.y_r,info, (select count(1) from oldman o where o.louID=l.id AND o.status=0) greenSum, (select count(1) from oldman o where o.louID=l.id AND o.status=1) yellowSum, (select count(1) from oldman o where o.louID=l.id AND o.status=2) redSum FROM marker_lou l WHERE l.id!=0

select d.id,d.qX,d.qY,d.styleIndex,d.qName, (select count(1) from oldman o,marker_lou l where o.louID=l.id AND l.jid IN (SELECT id FROM marker_street j WHERE j.qid=d.id)) sum, (select count(1) from oldman o,marker_lou l where o.louID=l.id AND o.status=0 AND l.jid IN (SELECT id FROM marker_street j WHERE j.qid=d.id)) greenSum, (select count(1) from oldman o,marker_lou l where o.louID=l.id AND o.status=1 AND l.jid IN (SELECT id FROM marker_street j WHERE j.qid=d.id)) yellowSum, (select count(1) from oldman o,marker_lou l where o.louID=l.id AND o.status=2 AND l.jid IN (SELECT id FROM marker_street j WHERE j.qid=d.id)) redSum from marker_district d WHERE d.id!=0

select s.id,s.jX,s.jY,s.styleIndex,s.qid,s.jName,d.qName, (select count(1) from marker_lou l,oldman o where o.louID=l.id AND l.jid=s.id) sum, (select count(1) from marker_lou l,oldman o where o.louID=l.id AND l.jid=s.id AND o.status=0) greenSum, (select count(1) from marker_lou l,oldman o where o.louID=l.id AND l.jid=s.id AND o.status=1) yellowSum, (select count(1) from marker_lou l,oldman o where o.louID=l.id AND l.jid=s.id AND o.status=2) redSum from marker_street s,marker_district d WHERE s.qid=d.id AND s.id!=0

SELECT d.id,d.qName, (select count(1) from oldman o,marker_lou l where o.louID=l.id AND l.jid IN (SELECT id FROM marker_street j WHERE j.qid=d.id)) sum, (select count(1) from oldman o,marker_lou l where o.louID=l.id AND o.status=0 AND l.jid IN (SELECT id FROM marker_street j WHERE j.qid=d.id)) greenSum, (select count(1) from oldman o,marker_lou l where o.louID=l.id AND o.status=1 AND l.jid IN (SELECT id FROM marker_street j WHERE j.qid=d.id)) yellowSum, (select count(1) from oldman o,marker_lou l where o.louID=l.id AND o.status=2 AND l.jid IN (SELECT id FROM marker_street j WHERE j.qid=d.id)) redSum from marker_district d WHERE d.id!=0

select s.id,s.jName, (select count(1) from marker_lou l,oldman o where o.louID=l.id AND l.jid=s.id) sum, (select count(1) from marker_lou l,oldman o where o.louID=l.id AND l.jid=s.id AND o.status=0) greenSum, (select count(1) from marker_lou l,oldman o where o.louID=l.id AND l.jid=s.id AND o.status=1) yellowSum, (select count(1) from marker_lou l,oldman o where o.louID=l.id AND l.jid=s.id AND o.status=2) redSum from marker_street s WHERE s.qid=#{id} AND s.id!=0
select h.id,o.oid,o.oldName,o.oldAddress,h.styleIndex,h.detail from marker_house h,oldman o WHERE h.jid=#{id} AND h.oid=o.oid
mapper.update: UPDATE marker_house SET styleIndex=#{styleIndex},detail=#{detail} WHERE oid=#{oid}
mapper.select: SELECT id, cx, cy, time FROM worker WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY time
